channel.title: Changing the -----scape is loading, please wait.?
channel.description:
How do i change the color? like here is the line of code in my client.
(noob question, I know. I've just gotten back into coding lmao.)
[code]aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method381(128, "-----Scape Client is loading, Please wait.", 23693, c1 / 2 - 26 - byte1, c / 2);[/code]
